title: HOUR 3- Don Mattingly Oct 05, 2020
itunes:title: HOUR 3- Don Mattingly Oct 05, 2020
description:
In this hour of The Dan Patrick Show, Miami Marlins manager Don Mattingly discusses his upstart team's surprising playoff run and dispels rumors surrounding a Covid-19 outbreak within the team at the beginning of the regular season. Also, NBA on TNT analyst and friend of the show Reggie Miller stops by to chat about the NBA Finals.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
